line.text: 'High amount of people means more chance of triggering an unfortunate event.'

line.text: 'You can gain 1 maximum perk by declaring a permanent war to any faction through the Ministry of War menu.'

sval.val: Maximum people allowed in this Outpost
High amount of people means more chance of triggering an unfortunate event.
You can gain 1 maximum perk by declaring a permanent war to any faction through the Ministry of War menu.
